pages.body:
# ZeroNet Proxies | [[ZeroNet]]

A proxy is a website that you can reach using any web-capable device that runs a multi-user [[ZeroNet]] instance. *[Learn how to host one](/kindlyfire.bit/?Post:9:Running+a+ZeroProxy)*. You can also install [[AWS Shadow Socks]].

## Currently Working

*Last checked: 2017-07-06*

* https://zero.acelewis.com
* https://zn.amorgan.xyz
* https://0net.io (See [[0net.io]])
* https://43110.cf (ZeroNet proxy with pre-rendering)
* http://zy5ut4vjx2szel76xyjcewqe2y3ezaovsfvzdpskofs4z2gckympdeid.onion (Tor required)
* https://botman.tech/
* https://z.hex3.cf
* http://50.3.70.3:2 (Same as z.hex3.cf but cloudflare is disabled)

## Not Currently Working

*Last checked: 2017-07-06*

* [[bit.surf]] (formerly bit.no.com) - Not Currently Working
* [[fuckcf.cf]] - Not Currently Working
* [[bigcat.tk]]
* [[zero.heyitswither.tech]]
